DOC.brief_summary: Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Divalproex Sodium ER Bipolar I Bipolar II Depression Previously Diagnosed Treated Recurrent Major Depression : This study recruit male female age 18 - 70 currently meet diagnostic criterion bipolar I bipolar II disorder currently experience episode major depression . Patients randomize double-blind treatment divalproex sodium ER placebo remain study six week . This six-week double-blind treatment period follow open-label treatment period six month duration . This study sponsor Abbott Laboratories .
